screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 50 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 160 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset - 60 if (500 > wsizex): wsizex = 500 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex -20, 100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex-100), (1080-wsizey)/7))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 50 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 160 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset - 60 if (500 > wsizex): wsizex = 500 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex -20, 100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex-100) / 7, (1080-wsizey)/7))
